thread.title: 'Mad Dog' Mattis confirmed as Defense secretary, first Trump Cabinet member to be approved
thread.title_full: 'Mad Dog' Mattis confirmed as Defense secretary, first Trump Cabinet member to be approved

title: 'Mad Dog' Mattis confirmed as Defense secretary, first Trump Cabinet member to be approved

locations.name: west front of the u.s. capitol

text:
'Mad Dog' Mattis confirmed as Defense secretary, first Trump Cabinet member to be approved 31 Mins Ago SHARES Getty Images Donald Trump's Defense Secretary Gen. James Mattis (C) arrives on the West Front of the U.S. Capitol on January 20, 2017 in Washington, DC. 
The U.S. Senate on Friday confirmed the first member of President Donald Trump's cabinet, voting overwhelmingly to approve retired Marine General James Mattis as Secretary of Defense. 
As voting continued, the vote was 70-0 to confirm Mattis.
